Text: More fact free Right wing nut job BS from Rush Limpballs

hey geek hillbilly......
................Hillbillies are independent, and self-reliant people...they don't fall for obama's class warfare....race baiting.....socialistic government dependency tactics......or his destruction of the military....and our constitution...Hillbillies stand for the same American values that Rush stands for...as do all of us who value him....Accuracy in Media [AIM] gives Rush over a 99% accuracy rating because of the reliability of his information....there is a reason he has over 600 stations....I don't think you're a Hillbilly....you may just live in a southern town somewhere and like to leave your muddy comments on other people's pages....you're probably just kind of a jerk....

these few comments can tell us a lot about the opposing viewpoints of the left and right. the left spouting off by calling the other side liars and other rude names. Then we see an articulate response on factual merits by a conservative, as opposed to a blind rage that liberals typically offer. thanks captain7ss for the upload of rush as always!
